English: to be on the phone (in a call)
to leave unanswered, to not answer
to put a call on hold
to connect the charger to the phone
to unblock, to undo the block
to put the phone on loudspeaker
Have you been trying to call (me)?
Why aren't you answering the phone?
Hungarian: Miért nem veszed fel a telefont?

English: The phone's battery is almost empty.
The battery of my mobile is almost empty.
I left my phone to charge.
Oh, the call was cut off.
Send me a message when you're on your way.
Download the xyz app from the app store!
Hungarian: Töltsd le az xyz appot az áruházból!

English: My phone is in silent mode.
My phone has been ringing the whole day
I'm addicted to my mobile phone
I'm constantly playing with my phone
I can't remember my PIN code anymore
I forgot my phone at home
My phone “stayed” (was left, forgotten) at home
I bought the phone about a year ago
Hungarian: Kb. egy éve vettem a telefont.

English: This is a good basic phone

Finnish: Puhelin riittää peruskäyttöön paremmin kuin hyvin.
English: This phone is more than good enough for basic use
Hungarian: Ez a telefon több mint elég alaphasználatra.

English: I have been (very) satisfied with this phone
Hungarian: Nagyon elégedett vagyok ezzel a telefonnal.

English: The battery lasts a really long time
The battery can last even four days
Hungarian: Az akku akár négy napig is bírja.

English: This is the best phone ever!
Hungarian: Ez a valaha volt legjobb telefonom!

English: I especially like the large screen
The quality of the camera is really bad
The quality of the camera is kind of bad
I recommend (getting) a more powerful phone
